game_description: Battle Talent is a challenging physics-based roguelite sword-fighting game. Tired of fighting boring enemies? Battle Talent has created for you a mega seamless procedural dungeon with over 80 enemy variants, 100 weapons, 60 perks, and multiple landscapes that change each time. Battle Talent brings physics driven creatures to life. You'll get to epic boss battles like you've never experienced before. Features: - Thrill of the hack-and-slash - Variety of enemies and bosses, over 80 enemy variants with different moveset - Plenty of weapons and perks, over 100 weapons and over 60 perks - Built-in scripted mod menu with 1000 mods - Seamless huge dungeons with multiple landscapes that regenerate each time - Boss melee fight in VR - Sandbox & Parkour
